entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
